name: The Game of Life (itch) (Shenawy, Alper Üste)
name_original: The Game of Life (itch) (Shenawy, Alper Üste)
description:
How long can you balance your life and work when you are facing different events in your life everyday? Sometimes we need to let go of things we like or want to do, just to keep the balance in our life and not to piss off the boss.

Some itch.io free art was used in the making of this game:

  • Free Vector Grafic by HikkiHuy
  • FREE 2D Vector Game Background by MarwaMJ
  • Open Ui Constructive Kit - by Hamza Gameart
